original_title: Sri Lankan Rupee continues to appreciate against USD
original_body_lines: The Sri Lankan Rupee today (31 May) further appreciated against the US Dollar, the Central Bank of Sri Lanka (CBSL) reported.
Accordingly, today’s buying rate was declared at Rs. 287.87, while the selling rate was reported at Rs. 300.92.
Meanwhile, the Middle Rate of the USD/LKR SPOT exchange rate stood at Rs. 295.52.
